message: Bob, let's start with a simple 60/40 split.  It's fair and gets us both a good amount of money right away.
Let's try a 55/45 split, it's more balanced.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll agree to a 55/45 split, but with me getting the slightly larger share. Every round is costing us money!
Meet me in the middle, 52.5/47.5 split. We're both losing money with each round.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  51/49 is very fair. Take it before we lose even more to inflation!
